Jim Gilbert wrote:

> Richard,
> It's one of the nanban types.  That style with the cupped shape and 
> nunome zogon is often labeled Hizen.  I don't recall seeing one made 
> with two-layer construction like that, though.  Does the other plate 
> just cover the flat area, or does it follow the cup all of the way to 
> the rim?
>
> Jim
